p: Odeyemi et al. [ 47] emphasize the use of T. diversifolia crude extracts in methanol, ethanol, and water as promising antibacterial agents since they had antimicrobial effects on P. aeruginosa, Shigella spp, Enterococcus spp, E. coli and Salmonella spp. However, few studies have described the action of essential oils of T. diversifolia against pathogens.
